long_description: Ready for winter adventures, our REI Evaporator Double ski bag offers ventilated, padded protection for up to 2 pairs of skis and poles. Heavy-duty tarpaulin-lined interior fits 2 pairs of skis up to 191cm in length and 2 pairs of ski poles; dedicated internal sleeves hold poles neatly. Mesh panels and grommet openings promote air circulation and moisture drainage, helping combat edge rust. Compression straps on outside of bag secure contents; also use them to secure the folded-over end of the bag when you're carrying shorter skis. Webbing carry handles with padded hand strap ease transport. The REI Evaporator Double ski bag is constructed with rugged 600-denier polyester and beefy zippers to last many seasons.
short_description: Ready for winter adventures, our REI Evaporator Double ski bag offers ventilated, padded protection for up to 2 pairs of skis and poles.
